briefdescription.para: Construct a new MTTHist object and send the arguments directly to the underlying root histogramm.
Wrapper around an already existing histograms.
Multithreading wrapper for all THist spectra of root library.

detaileddescription.para: To fill the histogram from within one thread : some_TH1F_histo[MTObject::getThreadIndex()]->Fill(<normal arguments for TH1*::Fill()>) Or in a more concise way (preferred) : some_TH1F_histo.Fill(<normal arguments for TH1*::Fill()>) Once the histograms have been filled, two options :
